title: Educational scholarships recognize household stewardship
content:
Scenario: Educational scholarships recognize household stewardship
    Given Marcus demonstrates sophisticated capability through scanner usage
    And educational opportunities require funding
    When scholarship opportunities arise
    Then Marcus's care contributions should be evidence of his capability
    And his resource management skills should be academically recognized
    And community should invest in children demonstrating stewardship
    And scholarships should flow to capable young people like Marcus
    And his household labor should translate to educational opportunity
    And care economy should create pathways to advancement
